ModMetaData.name: Wicca
ModMetaData.author: stellar_kitty

li.displayName: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

ModMetaData.description: This mod adds another Meme I couldn't find in the Steam Workshop. It works best with Oskar's Vanilla Ideology Expanded, for the mod refers to some of that code. Also, you obviously have to have Ideology installed. The mod lets you make your own Wicca Coven, trying to preserve and protect nature.
